member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.BarcodeType
member.summary: Defines the type of the barcode to be generated. Code39 - render the code39 barcode. Code128 - render the code128 barcode. Code128A - render the code128A barcode. Code128B - render the code128B barcode. Code128C - render the code128C barcode. Codabar - render the Codabar barcode. Ean8 - render the Ean8 barcode. Ean13 - render the Ean8 barcode. UpcA - render the UpcA barcode. UpcE - render the UpcE barcode. Code11 - render the code11 barcode. Code93 - render the code93 barcode. Code93Extension - render the Code93Extension barcode. Code39Extension - render the Code39Extension barcode. Code32 - render the Code32 barcode.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the text alignment for the text to be rendered in the barcode Left - Align the text to the left side of the barcode element. Right - Align the text to the right side of the barcode element. Center - Align the text to the center side of the barcode element.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.TextPosition
member.summary: Defines the text position for the text to be rendered in the barcode. Bottom - Text will be rendered in the bottom of the barcode element. Top - Text will be rendered in the top of the barcode element.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Indicated the recovery capacity of the qrcode Low - The Recovery capacity is 7%(approx.) Medium - The Recovery capacity is 15%(approx.) Quartile -The Recovery capacity is 25%(approx.) High -The Recovery capacity is 30%(approx.)

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.QRCodeVersion
member.summary: Defines the Qrcode QRCodeVersion Auto - Specifies the default version. Version01 - Specifies version 1 (21 x 21 modules). Version02 - Specifies version 2 (25 x 25 modules). Version03 - Specifies version 3 (29 x 29 modules). Version04 - Specifies version 4 (33 x 33 modules). Version05 - Specifies version 5 ( 37 x 37 modules). Version06 - Specifies version 6 (41 x 41 modules). Version07 - Specifies version 7 (45 x 45 modules). Version08 - Specifies version 8 (49 x 49 modules). Version09 - Specifies version 9 (53 x 53 modules). Version10 - Specifies version 10 (57 x 57 modules). Version11 - Specifies version 11(61 x 61 modules). Version12 - Specifies version 12 (65 x 65 modules). Version13 - Specifies version 13 (69 x 69 modules). Version14 - Specifies version 14 (73 x 73 modules). Version15 - Specifies version 15 (77 x 77 modules). Version16 - Specifies version 16(85 x 85 modules). Version17 - Specifies version 17 (85 x 85 modules). Version18 - Specifies version 18 (89 x 89 modules). Version19 - Specifies version 19 (93 x 93 modules). Version20 - Specifies version 20 (97 x 97 modules). Version21 - Specifies version 21 (101 x 101 modules). Version22 - Specifies version 22 (105 x 105 modules). Version23 - Specifies version 23 (109 x 109 modules). Version24 - Specifies version 24 (113 x 113 modules). Version25 - Specifies version 25 (117 x 117 modules). Version26 - Specifies version 26 (121 x 121 modules). Version27 - Specifies version 27 (125 x 125 modules). Version28 - Specifies version 28 (129 x 129 modules). Version29 - Specifies version 29 (133 x 133 modules). Version30 - Specifies version 30 (137 x 137 modules). Version31 - Specifies version 31 (141 x 141 modules). Version32 - Specifies version 32(145 x 145 modules). Version33 - Specifies version 33(149 x 149 modules). Version34 - Specifies version 34(153 x 153 modules). Version35 - Specifies version 35 (157 x 157 modules). Version36 - Specifies version 36(161 x 161 modules). Version37 - Specifies version 37(165 x 165 modules). Version38 - Specifies version 38(169 x 169 modules). Version39 - Specifies version 39(173 x 173 modules). Version40 - Specifies version 40(177 x 177 modules).

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.DataMatrixEncoding
member.summary: Defines the encoding type for the datamatrix code. Auto - Encoding type will be automatically assigned for the given input. ASCII - Accept only the ASCII values. ASCIINumeric - Accept only the ASCII numeric values. Base256 -Accept the base256 values.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.DataMatrixSize
member.summary: Defines the size for the datamatrix code. Auto - modules will be generated automatically. Size10x10 - will generate 1010 modules. Size12x12 - will generate 1212 modules. Size14x14 - will generate 1414 modules. Size16x16 - will generate 1616 modules. Size18x18 - will generate 1818 modules. Size20x20 - will generate 2020 modules. Size22x22 - will generate 2222 modules. Size24x24 - will generate 2424 modules. Size26x26 - will generate 2626 modules. Size32x32 - will generate 3232 modules. Size36x36 - will generate 3636 modules. Size40x40 - will generate 4040 modules. Size44x44 - will generate 4444 modules. Size48x48 - will generate 4848 modules. Size52x52 - will generate 5252 modules. Size64x64 - will generate 6464 modules. Size72x72 - will generate 7272 modules. Size80x80 - will generate 8080 modules. Size88x88 - will generate 8888 modules. Size96x96 - will generate 9686 modules. Size104x104 - will generate 104104 modules. Size120x120 - will generate 120120 modules. Size132x132 - will generate 132132 modules. Size144x144 - will generate 144144 modules. Size8x18 - will generate 818 modules. Size8x32 - will generate 832 modules. Size12x26 - will generate 1226 modules. Size12x36 - will generate 1236 modules. Size16x36 - will generate 1636 modules. Size16x48 - will generate 1648 modules.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.BarcodeGenerator.QRInputMode
member.summary: Defines the Qrcode input mode NumericMode - Changes its mode to numericMode when the given input is numeric. BinaryMode - Changes its mode to BinaryMode when the given input is numeric or smaller case or both. AlphaNumericMode - Changes its mode to AlphaNumericMode when the given is numeric or upper case or both.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Calendars.EjsDateTimePicker.DayHeaderFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format of the day that to be displayed in header. By default, the format is ‘short’. Possible formats are: `Short` - Sets the short format of day name (like Su ) in day header. `Narrow` - Sets the single character of day name (like S ) in day header. `Abbreviated` - Sets the min format of day name (like Sun ) in day header. `Wide` - Sets the long format of day name (like Sunday ) in day header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Calendars.EjsDateTimePicker.Depth
member.summary: Sets the maximum level of view such as month, year, and decade in the Calendar. Depth view should be smaller than the start view to restrict its view navigation.

Always: The floating label will always float above the input. Auto: The floating label will float above the input after focusing or entering a value in the input.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.ChartCommonAxis.IntervalType
member.summary: Specifies the types like `Years`, `Months`, `Days`, `Hours`, `Minutes`, `Seconds` in date time axis.They are, Auto: Defines the interval of the axis based on data. Years: Defines the interval of the axis in years. Months: Defines the interval of the axis in months. Days: Defines the interval of the axis in days. Hours: Defines the interval of the axis in hours. Minutes: Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.summary: Specifies the padding for the axis range in terms of interval.They are, none: Padding cannot be applied to the axis. normal: Padding is applied to the axis based on the range calculation. additional: Interval of the axis is added as padding to the minimum and maximum values of the range. round: Axis range is rounded to the nearest possible value divided by the interval.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.SelectionMode
member.summary: Defines the SelectionMode, They are. none - Disable the selection. series - To select a series. point - To select a point. cluster - To select a cluster of point dragXY - To select points, by dragging with respect to both horizontal and vertical axis dragX - To select points, by dragging with respect to horizontal axis. dragY - To select points, by dragging with respect to vertical axis.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartTheme
member.summary: Defines Theme of the chart. They are Material - Render a chart with Material theme. Fabric - Render a chart with Fabric theme

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.BoxPlotMode
member.summary: Defines the BoxPlotMode for box and whisker chart series, They are. exclusive - Series render based on exclusive mode. inclusive - Series render based on inclusive mode. normal - Series render based on normal mode.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartDrawType
member.summary: Type of series to be drawn in radar or polar series. They are line - Renders the line series. column - Renders the column series. area - Renders the area series. scatter - Renders the scatter series. spline - Renders the spline series. stackingColumn - Renders the stacking column series. stackingArea - Renders the stacking area series. rangeColumn - Renders the range column series. splineArea - Renders the spline area series.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LegendShape
member.summary: Defines the shape of legend. They are circle - Renders a circle. rectangle - Renders a rectangle. triangle - Renders a triangle. diamond - Renders a diamond. cross - Renders a cross. horizontalLine - Renders a horizontalLine. verticalLine - Renders a verticalLine. pentagon - Renders a pentagon. invertedTriangle - Renders a invertedTriangle. SeriesType -Render a legend shape based on series type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Segment
member.summary: Defines the segment axis. They are, X - Segment calculation rendered based on horizontal axis Y - Segment calculation rendered based on vertical axis

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.SplineType
member.summary: It defines type of spline. Natural - Used to render Natural spline. Cardinal - Used to render cardinal spline. Clamped - Used to render Clamped spline Monotonic - Used to render monotonic spline

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartSeriesType
member.summary: Defines the type series in chart. They are line - Renders the line series. column - Renders the column series. area - Renders the area series. pie - Renders the pie series. polar - Renders the polar series. radar - Renders the radar series. bar - Renders the stacking column series histogram - Renders the histogram series stackingColumn - Renders the stacking column series. stackingArea - Renders the stacking area series. stackingLine - Renders the stacking line series. stackingBar - Renders the stacking bar series. StackingColumn100 - Renders the stacking column series. StackingArea100 - Renders the stacking area 100 percent series stackingLine100 - Renders the stacking line 100 percent series. StackingBar100 - Renders the stacking bar 100 percent series. stepLine - Renders the step line series. stepArea - Renders the step area series. scatter - Renders the scatter series. spline - Renders the spline series rangeColumn - Renders the rangeColumn series. hilo - Renders the hilo series hiloOpenClose - Renders the HiloOpenClose Series Waterfall - Renders the Waterfall Series rangeArea - Renders the rangeArea series. Pareto-Render the Pareto series

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.TrendlineTypes
member.summary: Defines the type of trendlines. They are Linear - Defines the linear trendline Exponential - Defines the exponential trendline Polynomial - Defines the polynomial trendline Power - Defines the power trendline Logarithmic - Defines the logarithmic trendline MovingAverage - Defines the moving average trendline

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartShape
member.summary: Defines the shape of marker. They are circle - Renders a circle. rectangle - Renders a rectangle. triangle - Renders a triangle. diamond - Renders a diamond. cross - Renders a cross. horizontalLine - Renders a horizontalLine. verticalLine - Renders a verticalLine. pentagon- Renders a pentagon. invertedTriangle - Renders a invertedTriangle. image - Renders a image.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LabelPosition
member.summary: Defines the LabelPosition, They are. outer - Position the label outside the point. top - Position the label on top of the point. bottom - Position the label on bottom of the point. middle - Position the label to middle of the point. auto - Position the label based on series.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.TextOverflow
member.summary: Defines the Text overflow. None - Shown the chart title with overlap if exceed. Wrap - Shown the chart title with wrap if exceed. Trim - Shown the chart title with trim if exceed.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ErrorBarDirection
member.summary: Defines the direction of error bar. They are both - Renders both direction of error bar. minus - Renders minus direction of error bar. plus - Renders plus direction error bar.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ErrorBarMode
member.summary: Defines the modes of error bar. They are vertical - Renders a vertical error bar. horizontal - Renders a horizontal error bar. both - Renders both side error bar.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ErrorBarType
member.summary: Defines the type of error bar. They are fixed - Renders a fixed type error bar. percentage - Renders a percentage type error bar. standardDeviation - Renders a standard deviation type error bar. standardError -Renders a standard error type error bar. custom -Renders a custom type error bar.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.EdgeLabelPlacement
member.summary: Defines the Edge Label Placement for an axis. They are none - No action will be perform. hide - Edge label will be hidden. shift - Shift the edge labels.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.IntervalType
member.summary: Defines the interval type of datetime axis. They are auto - Define the interval of the axis based on data. years - Define the interval of the axis in years. months - Define the interval of the axis in months. days - Define the interval of the axis in days. hours - Define the interval of the axis in hours. minutes - Define the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are none - Shows all the labels. hide - Hide the label when it intersect. rotate45 - Rotate the label to 45 degree when it intersect. rotate90 - Rotate the label to 90 degree when it intersect.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LabelPlacement
member.summary: Defines the Label Placement for category axis. They are betweenTicks - Render the label between the ticks. onTicks - Render the label on the ticks.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.AxisPosition
member.summary: Defines the Position. They are inside - Place the ticks or labels inside to the axis line. outside - Place the ticks or labels outside to the axis line.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartRangePadding
member.summary: Defines the range padding of axis. They are none - Padding cannot be applied to the axis. normal - Padding is applied to the axis based on the range calculation. additional - Interval of the axis is added as padding to the minimum and maximum values of the range. round - Axis range is rounded to the nearest possible value divided by the interval.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.SkeletonType
member.summary: Defines the skeleton type for the axis. Date - it formats date only. DateTime - it formats date and time. Time - it formats time only.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ValueType
member.summary: Defines the type of axis. They are double - Renders a numeric axis. dateTime - Renders a dateTime axis. category - Renders a category axis. logarithmic - Renders a log axis. DateTimeCategory - Renders a datetime DateTimeCategory axis

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Anchor
member.summary: Defines the strip line text position. Start - Places the strip line text at the start. Middle - Places the strip line text in the middle. End - Places the strip line text at the end.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.SizeType
member.summary: Defines the unit of Strip line Size. They are auto pixel year month day hour minutes seconds

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ZIndex
member.summary: Specifies the order of the strip line. `Over` | `Behind`. Over - Places the strip line over the series elements. Behind - laces the strip line behind the series elements.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.BorderType
member.summary: Defines border type for multi level labels. Rectangle Brace WithoutBorder Without top Border Without top and bottom border Curly brace

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Units
member.summary: Defines Coordinate units of an annotation. They are Pixel Point

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Regions
member.summary: Defines regions of an annotation. They are Chart Series

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.Position
member.summary: Defines the Position. They are top - Align the element to the top. middle - Align the element to the center. bottom - Align the element to the bottom.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.FinancialDataFields
member.summary: Defines the financial data fields High - Represents the highest price in the stocks over time Low - Represents the lowest price in the stocks over time Open - Represents the opening price in the stocks over time Close - Represents the closing price in the stocks over time

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.TechnicalIndicators
member.summary: Defines the type of technical indicators. They are Sma - Predicts the trend using Simple Moving Average approach Ema - Predicts the trend using Exponential Moving Average approach Tma - Predicts the trend using Triangle Moving Average approach Atr - Predicts the trend using Average True Range approach AccumulationDistribution - Predicts the trend using Accumulation Distribution approach Momentum - Predicts the trend using Momentum approach Rsi - Predicts the trend using RSI approach Macd - Predicts the trend using Moving Average Convergence Divergence approach Stochastic - Predicts the trend using Stochastic approach BollingerBands - Predicts the trend using Bollinger approach

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ConnectorType
member.summary: Defines the ConnectorType. They are Line - Accumulation series Connector line type as Straight line. Curve - Accumulation series Connector line type as Curved line.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LineType
member.summary: Defines the mode of line in crosshair. They are none - Hides both vertical and horizontal crosshair line. both - Shows both vertical and horizontal crosshair line. vertical - Shows the vertical line. horizontal - Shows the horizontal line.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.LegendPosition
member.summary: Defines the position of the legend. They are auto - Places the legend based on area type. top - Displays the legend on the top of chart. left - Displays the legend on the left of chart. bottom - Displays the legend on the bottom of chart. right - Displays the legend on the right of chart. custom - Displays the legend based on given x and y value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ZoomMode
member.summary: Defines the zooming mode, They are. x,y - Chart will be zoomed with respect to both vertical and horizontal axis. x - Chart will be zoomed with respect to horizontal axis. y - Chart will be zoomed with respect to vertical axis.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.AccumulationSelectionMode
member.summary: Defines the SelectionMode, They are. none - Disable the selection. point - To select a point.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.AccumulationTheme
member.summary: Defines Theme of the accumulation chart. They are Material - Render a accumulation chart with Material theme. Fabric - Render a accumulation chart with fabric theme.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.GroupModes
member.summary: Defines the mode of the group mode Point - When choosing points, the selected points get grouped. Value - When choosing values, the points which less then values get grouped.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.PyramidModes
member.summary: Defines the mode of the pyramid Linear - Height of the pyramid segments reflects the values Surface - Surface/Area of the pyramid segments reflects the values

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.AccumulationType
member.summary: Defines the Accumulation Chart series type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.AccumulationLabelPosition

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.RangeLabelIntersectAction

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.RangeValueType

member.summary: Defines edge data label placement for datalabel, if exceeds the sparkline area horizontally. None - Edge data label shown as clipped text. Shift - Edge data label moved inside the sparkline area. Hide - Edge data label will hide, if exceeds the sparkline area.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.RenderType
member.summary: Defines render type of smithchart. They are Impedance - Render a smithchart with Impedance type. Admittance - Render a smithchart with Admittance type.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.FlagType
member.summary: Flag type for stock events

member.summary: Defines the empty point mode of the chart. Zero - Used to display empty points as zero. Drop - Used to ignore the empty point while rendering. Average - Used to display empty points as previous and next point average.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartAreaType
member.summary: Defines area type of chart. They are none cartesianAxes polarAxes

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.EmptyPointMode
member.summary: Defines the empty point mode of the chart. Gap - Used to display empty points as space. Zero - Used to display empty points as zero. Drop - Used to ignore the empty point while rendering. Average - Used to display empty points as previous and next point average.

member.summary: Specifies the types like `Years`, `Months`, `Days`, `Hours`, `Minutes`, `Seconds` in date time axis.They are, Auto: Defines the interval of the axis based on data. Years: Defines the interval of the axis in years. Months: Defines the interval of the axis in months. Days: Defines the interval of the axis in days. Hours: Defines the interval of the axis in hours. Minutes: Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.summary: Specifies indexed category axis.

member.summary: It specifies whether the axis to be rendered in inversed manner or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartAxis.LabelFormat
member.summary: Used to format the axis label that accepts any global string format like 'C', 'n1', 'P' etc. It also accepts placeholder like '{value}°C' in which value represent the axis label, e.g, 20°C.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartAxis.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Hide`, `Rotate45`, and `Rotate90` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, None: Shows all the labels. Hide: Hides the label when it intersects. Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. Rotate90: Rotates the label to 90 degree when it intersects.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartAxis.LabelPlacement
member.summary: Specifies the placement of a label for category axis. They are, betweenTicks: Renders the label between the ticks. onTicks: Renders the label on the ticks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.ChartAxis.LabelPosition
member.summary: Specifies the placement of a labels to the axis line. They are, inside: Renders the labels inside to the axis line. outside: Renders the labels outside to the axis line.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.EjsChart.SelectionMode
member.summary: Specifies whether series or data point has to be selected. They are, none: Disables the selection. series: selects a series. point: selects a point. cluster: selects a cluster of point dragXY: selects points by dragging with respect to both horizontal and vertical axes dragX: selects points by dragging with respect to horizontal axis. dragY: selects points by dragging with respect to vertical axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.EjsStockChart.SelectionMode
member.summary: Specifies whether series or data point has to be selected. They are, none: Disables the selection. series: selects a series. point: selects a point. cluster: selects a cluster of point dragXY: selects points by dragging with respect to both horizontal and vertical axes dragX: selects points by dragging with respect to horizontal axis. dragY: selects points by dragging with respect to vertical axis.

member.summary: Information about annotation for assistive technology.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAnnotation.HorizontalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the annotation. They are Near - Align the annotation element as left side. Far - Align the annotation element as right side. Center - Align the annotation element as mid point.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAnnotation.Region
member.summary: Specifies the regions of the annotation. They are Chart - Annotation renders based on chart coordinates. Series - Annotation renders based on series coordinates.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAnnotation.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the position of the annotation. They are Top - Align the annotation element as top side. Bottom - Align the annotation element as bottom side. Middle - Align the annotation element as mid point.

member.summary: if set coordinateUnit as `Pixel` Y specifies the axis value else is specifies pixel or percentage of coordinate

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAnnotation.YAxisName

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.EnableAutoIntervalOnZooming
member.summary: If set to true, axis interval will be calculated automatically with respect to the zoomed range.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.EnableTrim
member.summary: Specifies the Trim property for an axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.Interval
member.summary: Specifies the interval for an axis.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.IntervalType
member.summary: Specifies the types like `Years`, `Months`, `Days`, `Hours`, `Minutes`, `Seconds` in date time axis.They are, Auto: Defines the interval of the axis based on data. Years: Defines the interval of the axis in years. Months: Defines the interval of the axis in months. Days: Defines the interval of the axis in days. Hours: Defines the interval of the axis in hours. Minutes: Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.IsInversed
member.summary: It specifies whether the axis to be rendered in inversed manner or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.LabelFormat
member.summary: Used to format the axis label that accepts any global string format like 'C', 'n1', 'P' etc. It also accepts placeholder like '{value}°C' in which value represent the axis label, e.g, 20°C.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: Specifies the actions like `Hide`, `Rotate45`, and `Rotate90` when the axis labels intersect with each other.They are, None: Shows all the labels. Hide: Hides the label when it intersects. Rotate45: Rotates the label to 45 degree when it intersects. Rotate90: Rotates the label to 90 degree when it intersects.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Charts.StockChartAxis.LabelPlacement
member.summary: Specifies the placement of a label for category axis. They are, betweenTicks: Renders the label between the ticks. onTicks: Renders the label on the ticks.

member.summary: Specifies the placement of a labels to the axis line. They are, inside: Renders the labels inside to the axis line. outside: Renders the labels outside to the axis line.

member.summary: Specifies the padding for the axis range in terms of interval.They are, none: Padding cannot be applied to the axis. normal: Padding is applied to the axis based on the range calculation. additional: Interval of the axis is added as padding to the minimum and maximum values of the range. round: Axis range is rounded to the nearest possible value divided by the interval.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.DiagramConstraints
member.summary: Enables/Disables certain features of diagram None - Disable DiagramConstraints constraints Bridging - Enables/Disable Bridging support for connector UndoRedo - Enables/Disable the Undo/Redo support Tooltip - Enables/Disable Tooltip support UserInteraction - Enables/Disable UserInteraction support for the diagram ApiUpdate - Enables/Disable ApiUpdate support for the diagram PageEditable - Enables/Disable PageEditable support for the diagram Zoom - Enables/Disable Zoom support for the diagram PanX - Enables/Disable PanX support for the diagram PanY - Enables/Disable PanY support for the diagram Pan - Enables/Disable Pan support the diagram ZoomTextEdit - Enables/Disables zooming the text box while editing the text Virtualization - Enables/Disable Virtualization support the diagram Default - Enables/Disable all constraints

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.DiagramTools
member.summary: Activates the diagram tools None - Enables/Disable single select support for the diagram SingleSelect - Enables/Disable single select support for the diagram MultipleSelect - Enables/Disable MultipleSelect select support for the diagram ZoomPan - Enables/Disable ZoomPan support for the diagram DrawOnce - Enables/Disable continuousDraw support for the diagram ContinuousDraw - Enables/Disable continuousDraw support for the diagram Default - Enables/Disable all constraints

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.ConnectorConstraints
member.summary: Defines the constraints to enable/disable certain features of connector. None - Interaction of the connectors cannot be done. Select - Selects the connector. Delete - Delete the connector. Drag - Drag the connector. DragSourceEnd - Drag the source end of the connector. DragTargetEnd - Drag the target end of the connector. DragSegmentThump - Drag the segment thumb of the connector. AllowDrop - Allow to drop a node. Bridging - Creates bridge on intersection of two connectors. BridgeObstacle - InheritBridging - Creates bridge on intersection of two connectors. PointerEvents - Sets the pointer events. Tooltip - Displays a tooltip for the connectors. InheritToolTip - Displays a tooltip for the connectors. Interaction - Features of the connector used for interaction. ReadOnly - Enables ReadOnly Default - Default features of the connector.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.FlipDirection
member.summary: Defines how the diagram elements have to be flipped with respect to its immediate parent FlipHorizontal - Translate the diagram element throughout its immediate parent FlipVertical - Rotate the diagram element throughout its immediate parent Both - Rotate and Translate the diagram element throughout its immediate parent None - Set the flip Direction as None

Dependency - Indicates the scope is package.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.NodeConstraints

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.SnapConstraints
member.summary: Defines the constraints to Enables / Disables some features of Snapping. None - Snapping does not happen ShowHorizontalLines - Displays only the horizontal gridlines in diagram. ShowVerticalLines - Displays only the Vertical gridlines in diagram. ShowLines - Display both Horizontal and Vertical gridlines. SnapToHorizontalLines - Enables the object to snap only with horizontal gridlines. SnapToVerticalLines - Enables the object to snap only with horizontal gridlines. SnapToLines - Enables the object to snap with both horizontal and Vertical gridlines. snapToObject - Enables the object to snap with the other objects in the diagram.

AllowDrop - Allow to drop a node. Bridging - Creates bridge on intersection of two connectors. InheritBridging - Creates bridge on intersection of two connectors. PointerEvents - Sets the pointer events. Tooltip - Displays a tooltip for the connectors. InheritToolTip - Displays a tooltip for the connectors. Interaction - Features of the connector used for interaction. ReadOnly - Enables ReadOnly

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.DiagramSnapSettings.Constraints
member.summary: Constraints for gridlines and snapping None - Snapping does not happen ShowHorizontalLines - Displays only the horizontal gridlines in diagram. ShowVerticalLines - Displays only the Vertical gridlines in diagram. ShowLines - Display both Horizontal and Vertical gridlines. SnapToHorizontalLines - Enables the object to snap only with horizontal gridlines. SnapToVerticalLines - Enables the object to snap only with horizontal gridlines. SnapToLines - Enables the object to snap with both horizontal and Vertical gridlines. snapToObject - Enables the object to snap with the other objects in the diagram.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.EjsDiagram.Connectors

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.EjsDiagram.Constraints
member.summary: Constraints are used to enable/disable certain behaviors of the diagram. None - Disables DiagramConstraints constraints Bridging - Enables/Disables Bridging support for connector UndoRedo - Enables/Disables the Undo/Redo support Tooltip - Enables/Disables Tooltip support UserInteraction - Enables/Disables editing diagram interactively ApiUpdate - Enables/Disables editing diagram through code PageEditable - Enables/Disables editing diagrams both interactively and through code Zoom - Enables/Disables Zoom support for the diagram PanX - Enables/Disable PanX support for the diagram PanY - Enables/Disable PanY support for the diagram Pan - Enables/Disable Pan support the diagram

member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Diagrams.EjsDiagram.Tool
member.summary: Defines the precedence of the interactive tools. They are, None - Disables selection, zooming and drawing tools SingleSelect - Enables/Disables single select support for the diagram MultipleSelect - Enables/Disable MultipleSelect select support for the diagram ZoomPan - Enables/Disable ZoomPan support for the diagram DrawOnce - Enables/Disable ContinuousDraw support for the diagram ContinuousDraw - Enables/Disable ContinuousDraw support for the diagram

member.summary: The `fields` property maps the columns of the data table and binds the data to the component. text - Maps the text column from data table for each list item value - Maps the value column from data table for each list item iconCss - Maps the icon class column from data table for each list item groupBy - Group the list items with it's related items by mapping groupBy field

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.FilterType
member.summary: Determines on which filter type, the component needs to be considered on search action. The available [`FilterType`](../../auto-complete/filtering/#change-the-filter-type) and its supported data types are

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.FloatLabelType
member.summary: Specifies whether to display the floating label above the input element. Possible values are: Never: The label will never float in the input when the placeholder is available. Always: The floating label will always float above the input. Auto: The floating label will float above the input after focusing or entering a value in the input.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it to the footer container of the popup list. > For more details about the available template options refer to [`Template`](../../drop-down-list/templates) documentation.

member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it to the group headers present in the popup list.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Accepts the template design and assigns it to the header container of the popup list. > For more details about the available template options refer to [`Template`](../../drop-down-list/templates) documentation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.Highlight
member.summary: When set to ‘true’, highlight the searched characters on suggested list items. > For more details about the highlight refer to [`Custom highlight search`](../../auto-complete/how-to/custom-search) documentation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.HtmlAttributes

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: ignoreAccent set to true, then ignores the diacritic characters or accents when filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.IgnoreCase
member.summary: When set to ‘false’, consider the [`case-sensitive`](../../auto-complete/filtering/#case-sensitive-filtering) on performing the search to find suggestions. By default consider the casing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.ItemTemplate

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.DropDowns.EjsAutoComplete.MinLength

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.EjsGantt.Toolbar
member.summary:
`toolbar` defines the toolbar items of the Gantt. It contains built-in and custom toolbar items. If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Gantt's toolbar.
The available built-in toolbar items are: Add: Adds a new record. Edit: Edits the selected task. Update: Updates the edited task. Delete: Deletes the selected task. Cancel: Cancels the edit state. Search: Searches tasks by the given key. ExpandAll: Expands all the task of Gantt. CollapseAll: Collapses all the task of Gantt. PrevTimeSpan: Extends timeline with one unit before the timeline start date. NextTimeSpan: Extends timeline with one unit after the timeline finish date. ZoomIn: ZoomIn the Gantt control. ZoomOut: ZoomOut the Gantt control. ZoomToFit: Display the all tasks within the viewable Gantt chart.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.AllowEditing
member.summary: If `allowEditing` set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column. By default all columns can be reorder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column. By default all the columns can be resized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.AllowSorting
member.summary: If `allowSorting` set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.CustomAttributes
member.summary: The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.DisableHtmlEncode
member.summary: If `disableHtmlEncode` is set to true, it encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.DisplayAsCheckBox
member.summary: If `displayAsCheckBox` is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.Edit
member.summary: Defines the `IEditCell` object to customize default edit cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.EditType
member.summary: Defines the type of component for editing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.Field
member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The `field` name must be a valid JavaScript identifier, the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.Filter
member.summary: It is used to customize the default filter options for a specific columns. ui - to render custom component for specific column it has following functions. ui.create – It is used for creating custom components. ui.read - It is used for read the value from the component. ui.write - It is used to apply component model as dynamically.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.Format
member.summary: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data. Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom [`number`](../../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting) and [`date`](../../../common/internationalization/#formatting) formats.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Gantt.GanttColumn.Formatter
member.summary: Defines the method which is used to achieve custom formatting from an external function. This function triggers before rendering of each cell.

member.summary: Defines the header template as string or HTML element ID which is used to add customized element in the column header.

Horizontal - Displays the horizontal grid lines only. Vertical - Displays the vertical grid lines only. Default - Displays grid lines based on the theme.

member.summary: Hierarchy Grid Print modes are `Expanded` - Prints the master grid with expanded child grids. `All` - Prints the master grid with all the child grids. `None` - Prints the master grid alone.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.PrintMode
member.summary: Print mode options are AllPages - Print all pages records of the Grid. CurrentPage - Print current page records of the Grid.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.TextAlign
member.summary: Defines alignments of text, they are Left Right Center Justify

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.FilterBarMode
member.summary: Filter bar mode options are OnEnter - Initiate filter operation after Enter key is pressed. Immediate - Initiate filter operation after certain time interval. By default time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.FilterType
member.summary: Defines types of Filter Menu - Specifies the filter type as menu. Excel - Specifies the filter type as excel. FilterBar - Specifies the filter type as filter bar. CheckBox - Specifies the filter type as check box.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.Aggregates
member.summary: Configures the Grid aggregate rows. > Check the [`Aggregates`](../../grid/aggregates/) for its configuration.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowExcelExport
member.summary: If `allowExcelExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Excel file.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to true the filter bar will be displayed. If set to false the filter bar will not be displayed. Filter bar allows the user to filter grid records with required criteria.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to true, then it will allow the user to dynamically group or ungroup columns. Grouping can be done by drag and drop columns from column header to group drop area.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowMultiSorting
member.summary: If `allowMultiSorting` set to true, then it will allow the user to sort multiple column in the grid. > `allowSorting` should be true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowPaging
member.summary: If `allowPaging` is set to true, the pager renders at the footer of the Grid. It is used to handle page navigation in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowPdfExport
member.summary: If `allowPdfExport` set to true, then it will allow the user to export grid to Pdf file.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` is set to true, Grid columns can be reordered. Reordering can be done by drag and drop of a particular column from one index to another index. > If Grid is rendered with stacked headers, reordering is allowed only at the same level as the column headers.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` is set to true, Grid columns can be resized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowRowDragAndDrop
member.summary: If `allowRowDragAndDrop` is set to true, you can drag and drop grid rows at another grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowSelection
member.summary: If `allowSelection` is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowSorting
member.summary: If `allowSorting` is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.AllowTextWrap
member.summary: If `allowTextWrap` set to true, then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.ChildGrid
member.summary: Defines Grid options to render child Grid. It requires the [`queryString`](grid/#querystring-string) for parent and child relationship.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.ColumnMenuItems
member.summary:
`columnMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom column menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `Filter` - Filter options will show based on filterSettings property like checkbox filter, excel filter, menu filter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.ColumnQueryMode
member.summary: `columnQueryMode`provides options to retrive data from the datasource.Their types are `All`: It Retrives whole datasource. `Schema`: Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the datasource. `ExcludeHidden`: Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the dataSource.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.Columns
member.summary: Defines the schema of dataSource. If the `columns` declaration is empty or undefined then the `columns` are automatically generated from data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.ContextMenuItems
member.summary:
`contextMenuItems` defines both built-in and custom context menu items.
The available built-in items are, `AutoFitAll` - Auto fit the size of all columns. `AutoFit` - Auto fit the current column. `Group` - Group by current column. `Ungroup` - Ungroup by current column. `Edit` - Edit the current record. `Delete` - Delete the current record. `Save` - Save the edited record. `Cancel` - Cancel the edited state. `Copy` - Copy the selected records. `PdfExport` - Export the grid as Pdf format. `ExcelExport` - Export the grid as Excel format. `CsvExport` - Export the grid as CSV format. `SortAscending` - Sort the current column in ascending order. `SortDescending` - Sort the current column in descending order. `FirstPage` - Go to the first page. `PrevPage` - Go to the previous page. `LastPage` - Go to the last page. `NextPage` - Go to the next page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.DataSource
member.summary: It is used to render grid table rows. If the `dataSource` is an array of JavaScript objects, then Grid will create instance of [`DataManager`](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/data/api-dataManager.html) from this `dataSource`. If the `dataSource` is an existing [`DataManager`](https://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/data/api-dataManager.html), the Grid will not initialize a new one.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.DetailTemplate
member.summary: The detail template allows you to show or hide additional information about a particular row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EditSettings
member.summary: Configures the edit settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableAltRow
member.summary: If `enableAltRow` is set to true, the grid will render with `e-altrow` CSS class to the alternative tr elements. > Check the [`AltRow`](../../grid/row/#styling-alternate-rows/) to customize the styles of alternative rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableAutoFill
member.summary: If `enableAutoFill` is set to true, then the auto fill icon will displayed on cell selection for copy cells. It requires the selection `mode` to be Cell and `cellSelectionMode` to be `Box`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableColumnVirtualization
member.summary: If `enableColumnVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableHover
member.summary: If `enableHover` is set to true, the row hover is enabled in the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: If `enableVirtualization` set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.EjsGrid.Toolbar
member.summary:
`toolbar` defines the ToolBar items of the Grid. It contains built-in and custom toolbar items. If a string value is assigned to the `toolbar` option, it is considered as the template for the whole Grid ToolBar. If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Grid's Toolbar.
The following code example implements the custom toolbar items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregate.Columns
member.summary: Configures the aggregate columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.ColumnName
member.summary: Defines the column name to display the aggregate value. If `columnName` is not defined, then `field` name value will be assigned to the `columnName` property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.CustomAggregate
member.summary: Defines a function to calculate custom aggregate value. The `type` value should be set to `custom`. To use custom aggregate value in the template, use the key as `${custom}`. Total aggregation: The custom function will be called with the whole data and the current `AggregateColumn` object. Group aggregation: This will be called with the current group details and the `AggregateColumn` object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Field
member.summary: Defines the column name to perform aggregation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Format
member.summary: Format is applied to a calculated value before it is displayed. Gets the format from the user, which can be standard or custom [`number`](../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) and [`date`](../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) formats.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.GroupCaptionTemplate
member.summary: Defines the group caption cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field name. key: The current grouped field value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.GroupFooterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the group footer cell template as a string for the aggregate column. The `type` name should be used to access aggregate values inside the template. Additionally, the following fields can be accessed in the template. field: The current grouped field. key: The current grouped value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridAggregateColumn.Type
member.summary: Defines the aggregate type of a particular column. To use multiple aggregates for single column, specify the `type` as array. Types of aggregate are, sum average max min count truecount falsecount custom > Specify the `type` value as `custom` to use custom aggregation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowEditing
member.summary: If `allowEditing` set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column. By default all columns are editable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowFiltering
member.summary: If `allowFiltering` set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column. By default all columns are filterable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowGrouping
member.summary: If `allowGrouping` set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column. By default all columns are groupable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowReordering
member.summary: If `allowReordering` set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column. By default all columns can be reorder.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowResizing
member.summary: If `allowResizing` set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowSearching
member.summary: If `allowSearching` set to false, then it disables Searching of a particular column. By default all columns allow Searching.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.AllowSorting
member.summary: If `allowSorting` set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column. By default all columns are sortable.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ClipMode
member.summary: Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are `Clip` - Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area. `Ellipsis` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area. `EllipsisWithTooltip` - Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Columns
member.summary: Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Commands
member.summary: `commands` provides an option to display command buttons in every cell. The available built-in command buttons are Edit - Edit the record. Delete - Delete the record. Save - Save the record. Cancel - Cancel the edit state.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.CustomAttributes
member.summary: The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DataSource
member.summary: Defines the column data source which will act as foreign data source.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DefaultValue
member.summary: Defines default values for the component when adding a new record to the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DisableHtmlEncode
member.summary: If `disableHtmlEncode` is set to true, it encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.DisplayAsCheckBox
member.summary: If `displayAsCheckBox` is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Edit
member.summary: Defines the `IEditCell` object to customize default edit cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.EditTemplate
member.summary: Defines the cell edit template that used as editor for a particular column. It accepts either template string or HTML element ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.EditType
member.summary: Defines the type of component for editing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.EnableGroupByFormat
member.summary: If `enableGroupByFormat` set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values. By default no columns are group by format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Field
member.summary: Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource. The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc., If the `field` name contains “dot”, then it is considered as complex binding. The `field` name must be a valid JavaScript identifier, the first character must be an alphabet and should not contain spaces and special characters.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Filter
member.summary: Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column. @default null

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.FilterBarTemplate
member.summary: The `filterBarTemplate` is used to add a custom component instead of default input component for filter bar. It have create and read functions. create: It is used for creating custom components. read: It is used to perform custom filter action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.FilterTemplate
member.summary: Defines the filter template/UI that used as filter for a particular column. It accepts either template string or HTML element ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ForeignKeyField
member.summary: Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source. If it is not defined then the `columns.field` will be considered as mapping column name

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ForeignKeyValue
member.summary: Defines the display column name from the foreign data source which will be obtained from comparing local and foreign data

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Format
member.summary: It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data. Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom [`number`](../../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) and [`date`](../common/internationalization/#number-formatting/) formats.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Formatter
member.summary: Defines the method which is used to achieve custom formatting from an external function. This function triggers before rendering of each cell.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Defines the column template as string or HTML element ID which is used to add customized element in the column header.

member.summary: Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header. If `headerText` is not defined, then field name value will be assigned to header text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.HeaderTextAlign
member.summary: Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.HideAtMedia
member.summary: column visibility can change based on its [`Media Queries`](http://cssmediaqueries.com/what-are-css-media-queries.html). `hideAtMedia` accepts only valid Media Queries.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Uid
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ValidationRules
member.summary: Defines rules to validate data before creating and updating.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.ValueAccessor
member.summary: Defines the method used to apply custom cell values from external function and display this on each cell rendered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Visible
member.summary: If `visible` is set to false, hides the particular column. By default, all columns are displayed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.Width
member.summary: Defines the width of the column in pixels or percentage.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowAdding
member.summary: If `allowAdding` is set to true, new records can be added to the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowDeleting
member.summary: If `allowDeleting` is set to true, existing record can be deleted from the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditOnDblClick
member.summary: If `allowEditOnDblClick` is set to false, Grid will not allow editing of a record on double click.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowEditing
member.summary: If `allowEditing` is set to true, values can be updated in the existing record.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.AllowNextRowEdit
member.summary: If allowNextRowEdit is set to true, editing is done to next row. By default allowNextRowEdit is set to false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.Dialog
member.summary: Defines the dialog params to edit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.Mode
member.summary: Defines the mode to edit. The available editing modes are: Normal Dialog Batch

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.NewRowPosition
member.summary: Defines the position of adding a new row. The available position are: Top Bottom

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowConfirmDialog
member.summary: if `showConfirmDialog` is set to false, confirm dialog does not show when batch changes are saved or discarded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.ShowDeleteConfirmDialog
member.summary: If `showDeleteConfirmDialog` is set to true, confirm dialog will show delete action. You can also cancel delete command.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridEditSettings.Template
member.summary: Defines the custom edit elements for the dialog template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the columns to be filtered at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the columns that were currently filtered.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ImmediateModeDelay
member.summary: Defines the time delay (in milliseconds) in filtering records when the `Immediate` mode of filter bar is set.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Mode
member.summary: Defines the filter bar modes. The available options are, `OnEnter`: Initiates filter operation after Enter key is pressed. `Immediate`: Initiates filter operation after a certain time interval. By default, time interval is 1500 ms.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Operators
member.summary: The `operators` is used to override the default operators in filter menu. This should be defined by type wise (string, number, date and boolean). Based on the column type, this customize operator list will render in filter menu.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.ShowFilterBarStatus
member.summary: Shows or hides the filtered status message on the pager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridFilterSettings.Type
member.summary: Defines options for filtering type. The available options are `Menu` - Specifies the filter type as menu. `CheckBox` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox. `FilterBar` - Specifies the filter type as filterbar. `Excel` - Specifies the filter type as checkbox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.CaptionTemplate
member.summary: The Caption Template allows user to display the string or HTML element in group caption. > It accepts either the [template string](http://ej2.syncfusion.com/documentation/common/template-engine/) or the HTML element ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the column names to group at initial rendering of the Grid. You can also get the currently grouped columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.DisablePageWiseAggregates
member.summary: If `disablePageWiseAggregates` set to true, then the group aggregate value will be calculated from the whole data instead of paged data and two requests will be made for each page when Grid bound with remote service.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowDropArea
member.summary: If `showDropArea` is set to true, the group drop area element will be visible at the top of the Grid.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowGroupedColumn
member.summary: If `showGroupedColumn` is set to false, it hides the grouped column after grouping.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowToggleButton
member.summary: If `showToggleButton` set to true, then the toggle button will be showed in the column headers which can be used to group or ungroup columns by clicking them.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridGroupSettings.ShowUngroupButton
member.summary: If `showUngroupButton` set to false, then ungroup button is hidden in dropped element. It can be used to ungroup the grouped column when click on ungroup button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.CurrentPage
member.summary: Defines the current page number of the pager.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.EnableQueryString
member.summary: If `enableQueryString` set to true, then it pass current page information as a query string along with the URL while navigating to other page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageCount
member.summary: Defines the number of pages to be displayed in the pager container.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageSize
member.summary: Defines the number of records to be displayed per page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.PageSizes
member.summary: If `pageSizes` set to true or Array of values, It renders DropDownList in the pager which allow us to select pageSize from DropDownList.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridPageSettings.Template
member.summary: Defines the template which renders customized elements in pager instead of default elements. It accepts either [template string](../../common/template-engine/) or HTML element ID.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridRowDropSettings.TargetID
member.summary: Defines the ID of droppable component on which row drop should occur.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Fields
member.summary: Specifies the collection of fields included in search operation. By default, bounded columns of the Grid are included.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.IgnoreAccent
member.summary: If ignoreAccent set to true, then filter ignores the diacritic characters or accents while filtering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.IgnoreCase
member.summary: If `ignoreCase` is set to false, searches records that match exactly, else searches records that are case insensitive(uppercase and lowercase letters treated the same).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Key
member.summary: Specifies the key value to search Grid records at initial rendering. You can also get the current search key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSearchSettings.Operator
member.summary: Defines the operator to search records. The available operators are:

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CellSelectionMode
member.summary: The cell selection modes are flow and box. It requires the selection [`mode`](grid/#mode-selectionmode/) to be either cell or both. `Flow`: Selects the range of cells between start index and end index that also includes the other cells of the selected rows. `Box`: Selects the range of cells within the start and end column indexes that includes in between cells of rows within the range. `BoxWithBorder`: Selects the range of cells as like Box mode with borders.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CheckboxMode
member.summary: Defines options for checkbox selection Mode. They are `Default`: This is the default value of the checkboxMode. In this mode, user can select multiple rows by clicking rows one by one. `ResetOnRowClick`: In ResetOnRowClick mode, on clicking a row it will reset previously selected row and also multiple rows can be selected by using CTRL or SHIFT key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.CheckboxOnly
member.summary: If 'checkboxOnly' set to true, then the Grid selection is allowed only through checkbox.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.EnableSimpleMultiRowSelection
member.summary: If 'enableSimpleMultiRowSelection' set to true, then the user can able to perform multiple row selection with single clicks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.EnableToggle
member.summary: If 'enableToggle' set to true, then the user can able to perform toggle for the selected row.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.Mode
member.summary: Grid supports row, cell, and both (row and cell) selection mode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.PersistSelection
member.summary: If 'persistSelection' set to true, then the Grid selection is persisted on all operations. For persisting selection in the Grid, any one of the column should be enabled as a primary key.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings.Type
member.summary: Defines options for selection type. They are `Single`: Allows selection of only a row or a cell. `Multiple`: Allows selection of multiple rows or cells.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSortSettings.AllowUnsort
member.summary: If `allowUnsort` set to false the user can not get the grid in unsorted state by clicking the sorted column header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridSortSettings.Columns
member.summary: Specifies the columns to sort at initial rendering of Grid. Also user can get current sorted columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Grids.GridTextWrapSettings.WrapMode
member.summary: Defines the `wrapMode` of the Grid. The available modes are: `Both`: Wraps both the header and content. `Content`: Wraps the header alone. `Header`: Wraps the content alone.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.DrawType
member.summary: specify the rendering mode SVG - Heat map is render using SVG draw mode. Canvas - Heat map is render using Canvas draw mode. Auto - Automatically switch the draw mode based on number of records in data source.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.HeatMapTheme
member.summary: Defines Theme of the heatmap.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.IntervalType
member.summary: Defines the interval type of datetime axis. They are years - Define the interval of the axis in years. months - Define the interval of the axis in months. days - Define the interval of the axis in days. hours - Define the interval of the axis in hours. minutes - Define the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.LabelIntersectAction
member.summary: specify the label intersect action for axis None - Shows all the labels with overlap. Trim - Trim the label when it intersect. Rotate45 - Rotate the label to 45 degree when it intersect.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.LabelType
member.summary: Defines the axis label display type for date time axis. They are None: Axis labels displayed based on the value type years - Define the axis labels display in every year. months - Define the axis labels display in every month. days - Define the axis labels display in every days. hours - Define the axis labels display in every hours.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.ValueType
member.summary: Defines the type of axis. They are double - Renders a numeric axis. dateTime - Renders a dateTime axis. category - Renders a category axis.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.BorderType
member.summary: Defines border type for multi level labels. Rectangle Brace WithoutBorder Without top Border Without top and bottom border Without bottom Border

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.Alignment
member.summary: Defines the Alignment. They are near - Align the element to the left. center - Align the element to the center. far - Align the element to the right.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.TextOverflow
member.summary: Defines the text over flow None - Used to show the heat map text with overlap to other element Wrap - Used to show the heat map text with Wrap support Trim - Used to show the heat map text with Trim

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.BubbleType
member.summary: Defines Bubble Type. They are Size - Define the bubble type is size. Color - Define the bubble type is color. Sector - Define the bubble type is sector. SizeAndColor - Define the bubble type is sizeandcolor.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.CellType
member.summary: Defines cell Type. They are Rect - Render a HeatMap cells in rectangle shape. Bubble - Render a HeatMap cells in bubble shape.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.HeatMap.PaletteType

Sets the collection of values to be mapped for non-mask elements(literals) which have been set in the mask of MaskedTextBox. In the below example, non-mask elements "P" accepts values "P" , "A" , "p" , "a" and "M" accepts values "M", "m" mentioned in the custom characters collection.
For more information on customCharacters, refer to [customCharacters](../../maskedtextbox/mask-configuration/#custom-characters).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Readonly
member.summary: It is used to render the Slider component in read-only mode. The slider rendered with user defined values and can’t be interacted with user actions.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.ShowButtons
member.summary: It is used to show or hide the increase and decrease button of Slider Component, which is used to change the slider value. Refer the documentation [here](../../slider/getting-started#buttons) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Step
member.summary: It is used to denote the step value of Slider component which is the amount of Slider value change when increase / decrease button is clicked or press arrow keys or drag the thumb. Refer the documentation [here](../../slider/ticks#step) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Ticks
member.summary: It is used to render the slider ticks options such as placement and step values. Refer the documentation [here](../../slider/ticks) to know more about this property with demo.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Tooltip
member.summary: It is used to denote the slider tooltip and it's position.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Type
member.summary: It is used to denote the type of the Slider. The available options are: default - Used to select a single value in the Slider. minRange - Used to select a single value in the Slider. It displays shadow from the start value to the current value. range - Used to select a range of values in the Slider. It displays shadow in-between the selection range.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.EJ2.Blazor.Inputs.EjsSlider.Value
member.summary: It is used to denote the current value of the Slider. The value should be specified in array of number when render Slider type as range.

Possible values are: `Never` - The placeholder text should not be float ever. `Always` - The placeholder text floats above the TextBox always. `Auto` - The placeholder text floats above the TextBox while focusing or enter a value in Textbox.
